refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: enum ChunkTypes
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { CHUNKER_RESET, CHUNKER_NOCHUNKS, CHUNKER_KEYS, CHUNKER_ROWS, CHUNKER_COLUMNS, CHUNKER_RECURSIVE, CHUNKER_2GROUPS, CHUNKER_3GROUPS, CHUNKER_4GROUPS, CHUNKER_5GROUPS, CHUNKER_6GROUPS } ChunkTypes;

refsect2.title: enum ChunkOrder
gok_chunker_chunk_all ()
refsect2.para: Breaks all the keyboards into chunks.

listitem.simpara: The type of chunks required e.g. rows or columns. (See the enum 'ChunkTypes' for possible values.)
TRUE if everything went OK, FALSE if there was any problem.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_init_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Initializes a GOK chunk. This must be called after creating any chunk.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunk that will be initialized.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_delete_chunks ()
refsect2.para: Deletes a chunk and, optionally, any following chunks.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the first chunk in the list of chunks that gets deleted.
If TRUE then all chunks following the one given will be deleted.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_next_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the next chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_previous_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the previous chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_next_key ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the next key in the chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_previous_key ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the previous key in the selected chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_keyup ()
refsect2.para: Highlights and selects the key to the top of the currently highlighted key. This does NOT wrap to the bottom side of the keyboard (call gok_chunker_wraptobottom).

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_keydown ()
refsect2.para: Highlights and selects the right to the bottom of the currently highlighted key. This does NOT wrap to the top side of the keyboard (call gok_chunker_wraptotop).

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_keyleft ()
refsect2.para: Highlights and selects the key to the left of the currently highlighted key. This does NOT wrap to the right side of the keyboard (call gok_chunker_wraptoright).

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_keyright ()
refsect2.para: Highlights and selects the right to the right of the currently highlighted key. This does NOT wrap to the left side of the keyboard (call gok_chunker_wraptoleft).

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_keyhighlight ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the given key.
NOT USED (deprecate?)

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_wraptofirstchunk ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the first chunk in the list of chunks

listitem.simpara: TRUE if successful, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_wraptolastchunk ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the last chunk in the list of chunks

listitem.simpara: TRUE if successful, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_wraptofirstkey ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the first key in the list of keys.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if successful, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_wraptolastkey ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the last key in the list of keys.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if successful, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_wraptoleft ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the leftmost key that is on the same row as the currently selected key.

listitem.simpara: unused.
TRUE if successful, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_wraptoright ()
refsect2.para: Highlights the rightmost key that is on the same row as the currently selected key.

listitem.simpara: unused
TRUE if successful, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_move_leftright ()
refsect2.para: Not implemented yet.

listitem.simpara: unused

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_move_topbottom ()
refsect2.para: Not implemented yet.

listitem.simpara: unused

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_next_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is another chunk after the current chunk.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a next chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_previous_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is another chunk before the current chunk.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a previous chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_next_key ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is another key after the current key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a next key, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_previous_key ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is another key before the current key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a key chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_top ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is a key to the top of the currently highlighted key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a key to the top, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_bottom ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is a key to the bottom of the currently highlighted key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a key to the bottom, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_left ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is a key to the left of the currently highlighted key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a key to the left, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_if_right ()
refsect2.para: Tests if there is a key to the right of the currently highlighted key.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there is a key to the right, FALSE if not.
Alwasy 0.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_is_left ()
refsect2.para: Tests if a key is left of another key. This does NOT test if the keys are on the same row. This should be called when traversing a row from right to left.

listitem.simpara: Key you want to test.
Key you want to compare against.
TRUE if pKey1 is left of pKey2, FALSE if pKey2 is left of pKey1.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_is_right ()
refsect2.para: Tests if a key is right of another key. This does NOT test if the keys are on the same row. This should be called when traversing a row from left to right.

listitem.simpara: Key you want to test.
Key you want to compare against.
TRUE if pKey1 is right of pKey2, FALSE if pKey2 is left of pKey1.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_is_top ()
refsect2.para: Tests if a key is top of another key. This does NOT test if the keys are on the same column. This should be called when traversing a column from bottom to top.

listitem.simpara: Key you want to test.
Key you want to compare against.
TRUE if pKey1 is higher than pKey2, FALSE if pKey2 is higher than pKey1.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_is_bottom ()
refsect2.para: Tests if a key is bottom of another key. This does NOT test if the keys are on the same column. This should be called when traversing a column from top to bottom.

listitem.simpara: Key you want to test.
Key you want to compare against.
TRUE if pKey1 is bottom of pKey2, FALSE if pKey2 is bottom of pKey1.
Counter you want to set.
Value you want the counter set to.
Counter you want to increment.
Counter you want to decrement.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_state_restart ()
refsect2.para: Move to the first state.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_state_next ()
refsect2.para: Move to the next state. Move to the first state if at the last state.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_state_jump ()
refsect2.para: Change state to the given state.

listitem.simpara: Name of the state you want to jump to.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_select_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Sets the current chunk as the selected chunk.

listitem.simpara: The number of keys in the selected chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_highlight_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the given chunk. Updates m_pChunkHighlighted with the chunk given.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunk that will be highlighted.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_unhighlight_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Unhighlightes the given chunk. Updates m_pChunkHighlighted.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunk that will be unhighlighed (made normal).

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_highlight_center_key ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the center key on the current keyboard.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_highlight_first_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the first chunk on the current keyboard. Updates m_pChunkHighlighted.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_highlight_first_key ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes the first key in the selected chunk. Updates m_pChunkitemHighlighted.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_insert_item_row_ltr ()
refsect2.para: Adds a chunkitem (key) to a chunk (row). The new chunkitem will be added in the sequence left to right (the leftmost key is the first key in the sequence).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the first chunk that will contain the new chunkitem.
Pointer to the chunkitem that gets added to the chunk.
TRUE if the chunkitem was added to the chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_insert_item_row_rtl ()
refsect2.para: Adds a chunkitem (key) to a chunk (row). The new chunkitem will be added in the sequence right to left (the rightmost key is the first key in the sequence).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the first chunk that will contain the new chunkitem.
Pointer to the chunkitem that gets added to the chunk.
TRUE if the chunkitem was added to the chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_insert_item_col_ttb ()
refsect2.para: Adds a chunkitem (key) to a chunk (column). The new chunkitem will be added in the sequence top to bottom (the topmost key is the first key in the sequence).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the first chunk that will contain the new chunkitem.
Pointer to the chunkitem that gets added to the chunk.
TRUE if the chunkitem was added to the chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_insert_item_col_btt ()
refsect2.para: Adds a chunkitem (key) to a chunk (column). The new chunkitem will be added in the sequence bottom to top (the bottommost key is the first key in the sequence).

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the first chunk that will contain the new chunkitem.
Pointer to the chunkitem that gets added to the chunk.
TRUE if the chunkitem was added to the chunk, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_dump_chunks ()
refsect2.para: Diagnostic function that prints all the chunks to stdout.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_dump_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Diagnostic function that prints the chunk to stdout.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunk that gets the dump.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_chunk_group ()
refsect2.programlisting: GokChunk* gok_chunker_chunk_group (GokChunk *pChunk, gint NumberGroups, ChunkOrder Order, gboolean bCanReorder);
refsect2.para: Breaks the given list of chunks into 2 or more groups.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the list of chunks that will be broken into groups.
Number of groups the chunks should be broken into.
The order in which the chunks should be created. (see enum ChunkOrder)
TRUE if the chunks can be reordered.
A pointer to the first chunk in the list of chunks. Returns NULL if the given chunk can't be divided into chunks.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_add_chunkitem ()
refsect2.para: Adds a chunkitem (key) to a chunk (group). The new chunkitem will be added as the last chunkitem in the list.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunk that will contain the new chunkitem.
Pointer to the chunkitem that gets added to the chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_count_chunkitems ()
refsect2.para: Counts the number of items in the given chunk.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the Chunk that will be counted.
The number of items in the chunk.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_make_2_vertical ()
refsect2.para: Creates 2 chunks that split the given chunk vertically.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunk that will be split.
A pointer to the first chunk, NULL if it couldn't be created.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_make_2_horizontal ()
refsect2.para: Create 2 chunks that split the given chunk horizontally.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the chunks that will be split.
A pointer to the first chunk, NULL if none could be created.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_make_4 ()
refsect2.para: Create 4 chunks from the given chunk. The 4 chunks are ordered like: 1 2 3 4

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the first in a list of chunks that will be split.
A pointer to the first chunk, NULL if none could be created.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_highlight_chunk_number ()
refsect2.para: Highlight the chunk identified by a number.

listitem.simpara: Id number of the chunk you want highlighted.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_get_chunk ()
refsect2.para: Finds a child chunk of the currently highlighted chunk.

listitem.simpara: Number of the chunk you are looking for.
A pointer to the chunk, NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_highlight_all_keys ()
refsect2.para: Highlightes all keys on the current keyboard.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_unhighlight_all_keys ()
refsect2.para: Unhighlightes all keys on the current keyboard.

refsect2.title: gok_chunker_resolve_overlap ()
refsect2.para: If one of the chunks has more than one item, move an item to another chunk.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the list of chunke sthat need to be resolved.
